name: malloc()
description:
Its 8 am you wake up and turn your PC on for a few games only to see green characters appear on the screen.

malloc() has struck, your precious hard drive space is gone replaced with enemies to fight.

You only have one recourse now, defeat malloc() and fight for your bytes, or admit defeat.

Luckily you have prepared for this day and have CodeBlocks hidden in your bytes to help you.

Kill enemies, Gather CodeBlocks, and defeat malloc().

TLDR: malloc() is a top-down shooter with an upgrade system, get more upgrades to be more powerful.

Controls:

WASD - Movement.

E - Pickup CodeBlocks

Q - Eject CodeBlocks

Left Click - Shoot!

Attributes:

Floor Texture: https://opengameart.org/content/castle-brick-connecting-tileset-16x16

Music: http://tones.wolfram.com/generate/GRR03MkoaIsLUB9dVON9Q2ILefCmqKJ5KSqwmMIwrYka8
